desc: Programming, playing games, managing relationships; I think everything can be turned into a problem and solved
I love the process of breaking down problems, analyzing the pieces, and finding the answers to each piece of a solution
I reflect on everything I do, and always consider what can be done differently
I want to understand how and why things work; I'm not happy with something 'just working'
I maintain strong relationships with those I work with, whether they are teammates, managers, or clients
I communicate as much as I can so everyone, including me, has all the details needed for their work and decisions
I'm proactive; I find things to do instead of waiting around for work
